Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game. 0

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON 0

Game.page1Part1: Select the Number of Tickets to play, The Cost per Ticket & Press BUY to begin. 0
Game.page1Part2: Match YOUR TICKETS to LUCKY NUMBERS and win the associated prize. 0
Game.page1Part3: Reveal a Multiplier Symbol to win the corresponding prize instantly. 0
Game.page1Part4: Reveal a Gold Coin Symbol to trigger a Mystery Bonus game. 0
Game.page1Part5: The Gold coin flips to reveal either Megamatch or Hyperspin Bonus. 0
Game.page2Part2: Find 3 matching multiplier amounts on any one row to win. 0
Game.page2Part4: Win the triggering ticket cost multiplied by the total accumulated multipliers. 0
Game.page3Part2: Revealed multipliers are accumulated in the field above. 0
Game.page3Part3: Keep spinning until the outer ring lands on COLLECT. 0
Game.page3Part4: Win the triggering ticket cost multiplied by the total accumulated multipliers 0
